website_summaries.verdict: One of the best Dolby Atmos soundbars available, the Arc is a powerful option to complete any home theater.
pros: A powerful soundbar that offers 3D sound and pairs well with other Sonos speakers
The sound quality produced by its 11 drivers reflects the price tag
Trueplay can be used to find the right sound settings for your home and your media
Comes with Amazon Alexa built in
cons: If you're new to soundbars, the high price tag may be intimidating

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but great sound. Setup takes patience!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, much better than Playbar. Not enough information in user manual to set up speaker on the first try. Nowhere in the manual is the TV setup option mentioned, which is required if you want your tv hdmi-arc to recognize the speaker (at least on my Samsung). After stumbling over this setting all went well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Locked down system
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice soundbar but also wanted to use my highend self-powered sub. I'm able to achieve this via optical splitter but not while the Sonos is in eARC. Also, $70 for a mounting bracket that should have been included in the first place, real geniuses. Yeah it's a good sounding sound bar but It's not a $70 for mounting hardware that should have been included in the first place sound bar. If anyone knows an adapter that will change it, leave a comment.
customer_reviews.author: MasterTRoll

customer_reviews.title: Overall disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have this soundbar for little over a week and overall sound quality is mediocre and not seems from any angle worth of $799. Most of songs which I played sound much better on Sonos one which is under $200. I noticed many users are complaining about same thing on sonos community forum stating distorted bass and muffled sound which exactly I am also experiencing. Sonos support stated they identified potential bug and will release it next week so wait to apply that fix to see if it fixes the sound quality before returning. As of now my recommendation is not to buy and really surprised how this soundar got very good prelaunch reviews .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome powerful crystal clear sound in a unobtrusive package
customer_reviews.text: Love the Arc. I replaced a Sonos Playbar with the Arc and the upgrade is significant. I’m no expert about sound by any means but I know what I like, and this sounds incredible. I have it paired with the Sonos Sub and two Sonos One’s for the surrounds. Basically the same setup I had before with the Playbar. The Playbar is now continuing it’s service in a guest room. The Arc is also quite excellent with music too. I’d choose it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Christina NY

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from the Playbar
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the Playbar to go with the Sub and two Play 3s. Great setup to supplement my LG C9 which does ATMOS processing over eARC. Arc mounted on a MantelMount MM540 (be sure to get the M5 20mm mounting screws). Sounds fantastic and there are plenty of reviews out there by audiophiles that will do justice in a write-up so I won't try. Just showing how the Arc looks on a mount and mentioning the mount screws required which is not included.
customer_reviews.author: CarsonH

customer_reviews.title: Great value, just needs PCM
customer_reviews.text: I've had this since release and so far it's great. My only complaint is that it doesn't support PCM, however they are working on it. If your TV does not have eARC you will now get the uncompressed atoms. I have ARC and luckily I get Atmos over DD+. My TV is a Sony 900e
customer_reviews.author: Heath Reed

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Arc. A great value for the price, albeit not cheap by any means. I’m using it with 2 Sonos One SLs surrounds. Sound is fantastic, especially when the source is Dolby Atmos (Dolby Digital + with only HDMI Arc on my LG7300). I watched Hamilton again on Disney+ and was blown away. Even compared to the Sonos Playbase, which is outstanding, the Arc has better sound reproduction. All in all, I would recommend the Arc to anyone who wants a premium sound experience for under $800. Oh, be sure your HDMI ports are set for Bitstream for Dolby Digital 5.1 passthrough, if you have that capability on your TV; otherwise PCM will only provide Stereo 2.0.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Wasted hours on set up... still doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I got a brand new Sonos arc white and sub but the app and system is super buggy. I’ve already wasted 2 hours and it still doesn’t work properly! I called support and was put on hold. I waited for over 30 minutes and then hung up and called back. They closed while I was on hold. I’ve factory reset both the sound bar and the sub multiple times. I’ve had to delete and reinstall the app many times over, and the set up always fails at different points along the way. The app is clearly very buggy. Don’t waste your time or money. Mine still doesn’t work...
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Greatest speaker I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Boom this sound bar is amazing. I won't review too much but let me tell you it automatically lowers the commercial volume when they come on. I would have bought it just for that nobody said anything about that feature and it's my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Desciscio

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great software!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, ease of use great, Sonos support is very good. I had a Playbar and upgraded for the new features offered. I have a full Sonos surround, subwoofer, two Play 5 2nd generation and with the Sonos Playbar I was unable to stream with Apple Play 2 via the surround setup. Now I can, have better sound, and the new software I enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects from subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Have the arc +sub, waiting for the rear speakers to b delivered. Connected to Samsung tv via arc hdmi. Sound is excellent. Sub keeps disconnecting from arc and doesn’t automatically connect on startup of tv. Have to delete the sub from the Sonos app and redo the setup..Never had this problem with the vizio bar+wireless sub in same location so not an internet issue. If I can’t find a solution will reluctantly have to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Sonos product and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I first got the Sonos Beam as a house warming gift and it was a great speaker for our home. I researched more about Sonos product and found out that the new Arc was coming out soon. Long story short I returned the beam and invested in the Arc and it was a game changer. I love bass when listening to music & watching movies and the Arc was superb in that field. For movies you can hear everything clearly and it created the home theater vibe. Overall love the product, sounds, and design. Debating if I should pull the trigger on the subs lol
customer_reviews.author: T. Le

customer_reviews.title: Best boom for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Completely worth the wait. WOW. The pride that went into this from the packaging to the app integration is awesome. I put this on my floating shelve, angles the back up about 2/3” to send the waves towards me, tuned it with my sub and surrounds, and I am blown away. Sonos. You.Did.It.Again. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo

customer_reviews.title: Sonos loyalists beware this requires new App & splits your system
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar quality & sound is absolutely incredible and everything you expect from Sonos. The problem is its the first Sonos that only works on the new Sonos app (Not the Sonos S1 app). What are the implications? I can't group this zone with S1 app zones and Alexa is wonky between the two different systems. Planned obsolescence is in full effect. Stick with the Playbar (I have two of those and they are great too).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glorious Sound, Great Aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: Added it to the rest of my system and up-leveled my whole experience. Not a complaint but worth noting the real value - the ability to really deliver 3D sound - requires not just a relatively new TV but also there are very few channels right now that have it. Setup was pretty easy, the Alexa mic is best-in-business (you can WHISPER ALEXA) and honestly it just looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute home-run. I've had other surround sound systems but this one tops them all. Very powerful and clear. Happy with the purchase. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and build is amazing! The set up can be a little wonky depending on your model of television. I have an LG OLED with a dedicated ARC port which, in my opinion, is a prerequisite to purchasing this since it allows for an optimized experience.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Just about everything; Dolby Atmos is amazing, as long as you have an ARC or EARC HDMI TV connection; sound from DVD/Audio is amazing; sounds like a dedicated 5.1 surround system, in a beautifully crafted soundbar
customer_reviews.author: Carl P. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Great home theater sound system
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing to hear so rich sound from a sound bar so thin. It became a great home theater sound system with the surrounding speakers and bass.
customer_reviews.author: J Garza

customer_reviews.title: Dolby Atmos at its best
customer_reviews.text: I've long been a big Sonos fan, but the Arc doesn't disappoint. It's a huge leap from the Beam and a noticeable improvement from the Playbar.
customer_reviews.author: Kupius

customer_reviews.title: Premium product. Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on behalf of a third party and they have loved it and had zero issues with it. Really enhanced the dialog for them
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Neubauer-Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Much Gooder
customer_reviews.text: It's not as response to my tv remote as the playbar was but other than that couldn't be happier with the sound!
customer_reviews.author: Lamar B

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, big miss on input for $800 sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! As expected from sonos. Do not miss my subwoofer. Just arc alone is enough. Bad points.. sonos went cheap and did not have dedicated hdmi input, you need to use arc or earc through your tv...which is very disappointing for a $800 sound bar. People have good older tvs that do have earc. Many tv don't communicate well throu arc for sound. Sonos relying on tv arc is a fail as the variation of sound that passes through is based on the tv communicating with sound bar. Sonos should have added atleast 1 dedicated hdmi input...this allows them to control the sound input/value. So great sound, but big miss on input.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Tran

customer_reviews.title: Systematic ARC error that Sonos won't address
customer_reviews.text: There is a systematic problem with the Sonos Arc where the communication between the Sonos Arc and the TV's eARC or ARC malfunctions. The Sonos product needs to be power cycled to fix this. Some individuals experience this every time they use the TV. There is a lively discussion on the Sonos community page about this. Sonos has not admitted to the problem and they give customers the run-around instead of admitting there's a systematic issue with the Sonos Arc. I recommend avoiding this product until Sonos fixes the issue.
customer_reviews.author: User769413

customer_reviews.title: over hyped
customer_reviews.text: I got sonos arc, sub and two sonos 1s for tv surround to replace my 4 year old bose soundtouch 300 system. i'm disappointed as there is only slight improvement of sound. sonos volume control using amazon fire tv remote is inconsistent. i'm constantly adjust volume whenever I change channels or programs. many shows would go from hardly audible to way too loud and then can't hear again.
customer_reviews.author: Pathguy

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect Atmos from Amazon streaming
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar along with the sub is amazing. However, at this time (12/2020) none of my 4k UHD movies I stream from Amazon have Atmos. Not sure why, Netflix has no problem with Atmos, but Amazon is a no-go. I have even tried John Wick from Amazon, which is the one movie everyone says offers one of the best Atmos experiences, but no Atmos for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Dean

customer_reviews.title: Can't ask for much more
customer_reviews.text: I've used this one time to make a fire and I can see that it is wearing down faster than I expected. That said, I'm an idiot. This produce does exactly what it is supposed to do guys. It's gonna be good for 100+ fires (I think). Look no further. It is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Simply A Beast
customer_reviews.text: Went from a “high end” Nakamichi to this truly Supreme Sound bar. Oh...My...Blown Away. Pair with the Sonos sub and Sonos One surrounds and skip a theatre
customer_reviews.author: Partridge Electrical Services, Inc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low end and sound pressure
customer_reviews.text: Big improvement of the playbase (which has been moved to a bedroom) Much more bass - wonder if I even need my sub now
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this if you’re using a movie projector.
customer_reviews.text: Waste! I bought almost an entire system to hook up in my movie room and can’t find any way to hook it up to the projector. I’ve tried hdmi splitters, Bluetooth, hdmi matrix boxes. Nothing works. Great system for streaming music from my phone but not a theater room.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: ONLY WORKS W S2
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE Sonos has lost their mind if they think I’m going replace thousands spent on my system for something that will only work with S2
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Internet and location REQUIRED.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Sonos Arch from their site. I knew it could connect to the internet but thought it would be optional. No. But it also requires your location and wifi password before you can connect to it. In my situation, i can't do that. My TV broke the same day the Arch arrived. You can NOT connect to it with a Bluetooth connection exclusively. The app requires invasive permissions which are only legal because the company can simply state it is "needed" when it seriously does not. I'm returning this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This took me a little longer then expected to set up, but it was worth the extra effort. Great sound quality, my living room is not that large and this makes me feel like I am in a theater; watching movies with this is amazing. It has a low profile design that goes well with the surroundings, and having the option of using Alexa has made listening to music or getting news convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is impressive. The sound is magnificent. Very easy to hook-up. Plug in the connector to the ARC slot on the TV, and plug in the power. Set it up through the phone app. , which was very easy. You can control it through your phone, or adjust the volume with your regular remote. It's about 4' long and around a 4" oval. It hooks up to your wifi independently, so you can use the Sonos radio or apple, too. It uses amazon voice control, but I do not use that so cannot comment. Impressive sound, but it is a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: MickM

customer_reviews.title: Probably the Best Soundbar in the market, and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: It’s no surprise that the Sonos ARC is selling like hot cakes, it’s indeed the best soundbar you could ever own. If you already own a Sonos 5.1 system or never owned a Sonos soundbar before, then this is the best of the best! Great Dolby Atmos sound, and easy to connect and operate. It’s long narrow sleek look Is perfect for setting up in front of your TV, or hanging on the wall, you will get glorious Dolby Digital Plus or Dolby Atmos sound. Pick up the Sonos ARC before they are SOLD-OUT, you will love every minute of it!
customer_reviews.author: BratPap

customer_reviews.title: Bring the theater experience home
customer_reviews.text: For me and my family, this is a thing of beauty. Husband and I always love to have our in house movie dates and this bar's quality of sound is fantastic. We get that in theater sound in our own home. It's also a wonderful speaker to play our music Playlist from our phones on. It is a big and rather heavy bar, so make sure to have space for it. Cord hookups are easy and the app for setup and operating the system is relatively easy to maneuver. I really like that if I decide to purchase additional Sonos speakers for other rooms of the house, that I can have it all connected together.
customer_reviews.author: Dinosaurs and Mermaids, mom of both

customer_reviews.title: Strange Bass sounds
customer_reviews.text: Watching TV there is a strange thumping noise on some bass notes. Check online and you will see a number of threads where people are complaining about the Bass. If you have a Sonos Sub you probably won't notice it. Outside of this bass issue it has the potential to be a rally nice spreaker. Before you part with $800 I would wait until there is a resoultion to the bass issue
customer_reviews.author: photobug

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This sleek unit is an improvement over the previous Sonos soundbar. The sound is fuller with deeper bass and crisper dialogue. Be aware that this speaker will not work with the S1 Sonos app. The S2 app is required. This speaker provides a rich sound experience whether enjoying a movie or listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell R. Alegre

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Bose soundbar 700 with this and the sound different like day and night I can now hear the conversations so clearly without turning the volume up and without creating pressure on my ears. I feel the same feeling of replacing an old noisy AC with a brand new silent one.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.kattan

customer_reviews.title: great quality lacks some bass for hard hitting music
customer_reviews.text: I have had the arc now for about a month and its a very nice sound bar buy it needs improvements for sure. The bass is distorted and pretty disappointing for 800$. I bought the 3rd gen sub recently and it helps but you can still notice some of the higher pitch bass that gets distorted with music. For movies the arc is amazing when in Dolby atmos. For music it needs some work. Still happy with the purchase but it has some improvements that should be worked out soon according to sonos.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easily 30%-40% Better Sounding than the Sonos Playbar
customer_reviews.text: So I have both the Sonos Arc and Sonos Playbar. I put them side by side and listened to each one individually. To me, the Arc easily beats the Playbar in overall high quality sound. Much better highs, mids, and lows overall. That being said, this thing is PRICEY.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound bar!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful sound bar! It sounds great. It plays music, movies, sports, and games excellently! I like the sleek, sturdy build, and the surround sound affect. This is quality beyond any sound bar I've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: E&E0715

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase- awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: We cannot day enough good things about this. Amazing sound quality! Easy to install! Sounds just like a surround sound home entertainment system! What a great value for the money. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Baker

customer_reviews.title: Temporarily out of stock seriously
customer_reviews.text: I think this is irresponsible for a company like Sonos to have the product go out of stock. This product is not cheap to the consumer so I don’t want to wait !
customer_reviews.author: tarloh

product_meta.title: Sonos Arc - The Premium Smart Soundbar for TV, Movies, Music, Gaming, and More - Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:ArcBring all your entertainment to life with the extraordinarily realistic sound of Arc, the premium smart soundbar for TV, movies, music, and more. Surround yourself in the story with 3D sound from Dolby Atmos, and enjoy control with your TV remote, your voice, the Sonos app, and Apple AirPlay 2.
feature_bullets: All-new Sonos Arc - Bring all your entertainment to life with the brilliantly realistic sound of Arc, featuring Dolby Atmos. Enjoy control with your TV remote, voice, the Sonos app, Apple AirPlay 2, and more.
3D sound with Dolby Atmos - Experience shows, movies, and games with the precise and immersive sound of Dolby Atmos.
Tuned to perfection - Enhanced Trueplay tuning technology optimizes the sound for the unique acoustics of the room.
Immerse yourself in the music - Stream music, radio, podcasts, and more from your favorite services with the Sonos app or Apple AirPlay 2 when the TV is off.
A truly powerful soundbar - Eleven high-performance drivers produce vivid detail and impressive bass.
Blends in beautifully - With its elongated shape, soft profile, and seamless facade, Arc discreetly mounts to the wall or sits beneath the TV without pulling focus.
Voice control - Amazon Alexa is built right in, so you can play music, check news, set alarms, get your questions answered, and more, completely hands free.
Hear every word - Arc was specially tuned with the help of Oscar-winning sound engineers to emphasize the human voice. Turn on Speech Enhancement in the app to clarify dialogue.
Build out your home theater - Wirelessly connect Sub and a pair of One SL rears for an even more immersive listening experience.
Compatible with the new generation of the Sonos app, Sonos S2.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars136 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
